  title={"Body"}

unique identifier for the integration.","example":"12345"},"third_party_software":{"type":"string","description":"The third-party software that this integration connects to.","enum":["netsuite","sage","xero","quickbooks","lucca","workday","sap_success_factors","bamboohr","ukg_ready","ukg_pro","personio","google_workspace","microsoft_entra","microsoft_teams","onelogin","okta","azure","slack","jira","ashby","greenhouse","lever","workable","sap_s4/hana","expensify","carta","generic","sage_intacct","workday_gpc"],"example":"netsuite"},"display_name":{"type":"string","description":"A human-readable name for the integration.","example":"NetSuite 2.0"},"deprecated":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the integration is deprecated.","example":false},"categories":{"type":"array","description":"One or more categories this integration belongs to.","items":{"type":"string","description":"A category this integration belongs to.","enum":["global_payroll","equity","time_tracking","accounting","calendar","collaboration","hiring","expense_management","sso","user_management","app_provisioning","automation","scim","human_resources","issue_tracking","learning_management","performance_management","productivity","ats","itsm","hcm"],"example":"accounting","title":"Category"},"example":["accounting","automation"]},"product_lines":{"type":"array","description":"Product lines supported by this integration.","minItems":2,"items":{"type":"object","required":["type","categories","use_cases"],"properties":{"line":{"type":"string","description":"Available product lines.","enum":["employer_of_record","independent_contractor","professional_employer_organization","contractor_of_record","global_payroll","us_payroll","deel_it","deel_hr"],"title":"ProductLine"},"categories":{"type":"array","description":"Categories associated with this product line.","items":{"type":"string","description":"A category this integration belongs to.","enum":["global_payroll","equity","time_tracking","accounting","calendar","collaboration","hiring","expense_management","sso","user_management","app_provisioning","automation","scim","human_resources","issue_tracking","learning_management","performance_management","productivity","ats","itsm","hcm"],"example":"accounting","title":"Category"}},"use_cases":{"type":"array","description":"List of use cases for the product line (minimal info). You can retrieve this info from the [Retrieve detailed use case information](https://stefano-romanelli-deel.github.io/integapi/docs/integrations/list-use-cases) endpoint.","items":{"type":"object","required":["use_case","more_info","requirements","status"],"properties":{"use_case":{"type":"string","description":"The use case name.","example":"employee_onboarding","enum":["employee_onboarding","payroll_processing","time_tracking","benefits_management","vendor_management"]},"more_info":{"type":"object","required":["method","url"],"properties":{"method":{"type":"string","description":"HTTP method to retrieve detailed use case info.","example":"GET"},"url":{"type":"string","description":"Relative URL to fetch detailed use case info.","example":"/use_cases?use_case=employee_onboarding"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"A brief description of the link.","example":"Retrieve detailed info for the use case."}},"title":"UseCaseLink"},"requirements":{"type":"array","description":"List of requirements for the use case.","items":{"type":"object","required":["category","content"],"properties":{"category":{"type":"string","description":"The type of requirement.","enum":["software","permissions","expertise","pricing"],"example":"software"},"content":{"type":"array","description":"List of requirement texts.","items":{"type":"string"}}},"example":{"category":"software","content":["Integrates with ERP system","Supports API-based data exchange"]},"title":"Requirement"}},"status":{"type":"string","description":"The development status of a use case or related item.","enum":["wont_do","not_supported","planned","in_dev","beta","public_availability"],"example":"Planned","title":"DevelopmentStatus"}},"title":"UseCaseRef"}}},"example":{"line":"global_payroll","categories":["accounting","automation"],"use_cases":[{"use_case":"employee_onboarding","more_info":{"method":"GET","url":"/use_cases?use_case=employee_onboarding","description":"Retrieve detailed info for employee_onboarding."}},{"use_case":"payroll_processing","more_info":{"method":"GET","url":"/use_cases?use_case=payroll_processing","description":"Retrieve detailed info for payroll_processing."}}]},"title":"ProductLines"},"example":[{"line":"global_payroll","categories":["accounting","automation"],"use_cases":[{"use_case":"employee_onboarding","more_info":{"method":"GET","url":"/use_cases?use_case=employee_onboarding","description":"Retrieve detailed info for employee_onboarding."}},{"use_case":"payroll_processing","more_info":{"method":"GET","url":"/use_cases?use_case=payroll_processing","description":"Retrieve detailed info for payroll_processing."}}]},{"line":"us_payroll","categories":["accounting","time_tracking"],"use_cases":[{"use_case":"time_tracking","more_info":{"method":"GET","url":"/use_cases?use_case=time_tracking","description":"Retrieve detailed info for time_tracking."}},{"use_case":"benefits_management","more_info":{"method":"GET","url":"/use_cases?use_case=benefits_management","description":"Retrieve detailed info for benefits_management."}}]}]},"requirements":{"type":"array","description":"List of requirements for the integration.","items":{"type":"object","required":["category","content"],"properties":{"category":{"type":"string","description":"The type of texts.","items":{"type":"string"}}},"example":{"category":"software","content":["Integrates with ERP system","Supports API-based data exchange"]},"title":"Requirement"},"example":[{"category":"software","content":["This is a requirement one","This is a requirement two"]},{"category":"permissions","content":["User must have admin rights","Consent required"]}]}},"example":{"id":"12345","third_party_software":"netsuite","display_name":"NetSuite 2.0","deprecated":false,"categories":["accounting","automation"],"product_lines":[{"line":"global_payroll","categories":["accounting","automation"],"use_cases":[{"use_case":"employee_onboarding","more_info":{"method":"GET","url":"/use_cases?use_case=employee_onboarding","description":"Retrieve payroll_processing."}}]},{"line":"us_payroll","categories":["accounting","time_tracking"],"use_cases":[{"use_case":"time_tracking","more_info":{"method":"GET","url":"/use_cases?use_case=time_tracking","description":"Retrieve
